name: tomitribe.io-static
description: The tomitribe.io website builder and static renderer

scripts.postinstall: npm ci --prefix generation && npm ci --prefix renderer
scripts.push:gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix static origin gh-pages
scripts.push:gh-pages-webapp: git subtree push --prefix webapp origin gh-pages-webapp

author: Tomitribe <contact@tomitribe.com>
